noteList.features:
Human Features:
Far Traveler Feature:
â¢ Your foreign nature can gain you access to those curious about your homeland
Druid Features:
â¢ Understand a secret druid language
â¢ You can shapeshift into the form of a beast as an action (see rules)
â¢ Druid Archetype: Moon
â¢ You can wild shape as a bonus action, and can use up a spell slot to regain 1d8 hp per spell slot level as a bonus action while wild shaped
â¢ You can wild shape into beasts of CR equal to your druid level/3 (min 1)
noteList.weapon-prof: Clubs, Daggers, Darts, Javelins, Maces, Quarterstaffs, Scimitars, Sickles, Slings, Spears

Leather belt pouch

noteList.notes:
Village burned down by Orcish barbarians.
Parents killed, she was kidnapped.
Shipped off for slavery.
Trained shape shifting and sign language with a friend.
One day they took the opportunity to escape, they transformed into spiders and crawled out off the cage.
Her friend lost concentration, transformed back and was killed right there.
Now she travels the world eager to learn anything that can aid her revenge.
noteList.traits:
Good at hiding emotions
Tunnel vision when angry
Afraid of fire
Not keen on travelling on a big ship
noteList.bonds: Finding the people who captured her and burned her village
noteList.flaws: Grown wary of Orcish and Barbaric looking people
noteList.name: Gerda

noteList.features:
Elf Features:
â¢ Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light
â¢ Immune to magical sleep, advantage on saves vs charmed
â¢ Meditating 4 hours counts as 8 hours of rest
â¢ Perception proficiency
â¢ Longsword, shortsword, shortbow, longbow proficiency
â¢ Can hide while lightly obscured by natural phenomena
Acolyte Feature:
â¢ Receive aid from those who share your faith
Cleric Features:
â¢ Cleric Archetype: Life
â¢ Healing spells of at least 1st level heal an additional 2 + spell level

noteList.features:
Tabaxi Features:
â¢ Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light
â¢ You can double your speed for a turn when you move but must spend a turn not moving before using this again
â¢ You can claw as an unarmed attack for 1d4 slashing damage and can climb with a 20 speed

Charlatan Feature:
â¢ You can forge documents after seeing an example to copy

Warlock Features:
â¢ Warlock Archetype: Hexblade
â¢ The spells shield and wrathful smite are added to the warlock spell list for you
â¢ 1/rest as a bonus action you can curse a creature for 1 minute, healing level + Cha mod hp when it dies, critting it on a 19, and dealing it proficiency bonus extra damage
â¢ Gain martial weapon, shield, and medium armor proficiency
â¢ You can use Charisma for attack and damage rolls with your pact weapons and one one-handed weapon you choose at the start of each day
â¢ See Through Another: You can see/hear/etc through the senses of a creature you touch (see rules)
â¢ Sweet Talker: You are proficient in deception and persuasion

noteList.features:
Turtle Features:
â¢ You can claw as an unarmed attack for 1d4 slashing damage
â¢ You won't run out of breath for 60 minutes
â¢ You cannot wear armor and you gain no armor bonus from dexterity, but your base AC is 17
â¢ As an action you can drop prone, reduce your speed to 0, and have disadvantage on dex saves to gain advantage on con and str saves and +4 AC. Until you end this as a bonus action you cannot take any other action.
â¢ Survival proficiency
Sailor Feature:
â¢ You can arrange free passage on a ship for your party
Druid Features:
â¢ Understand a secret druid language
â¢ You can shapeshift into the form of a beast as an action (see rules)
â¢ Druid Archetype: Shepherd
â¢ You know Sylvan and can speak with beasts (see rules)
â¢ As a bonus action you can create a 30 foot radius zone within 60 feet for 1 minute, than you can move 60 feet as a bonus action (1/rest)
â¢ When you create a zone it does one of: creatures you choose gain advantage on Str saves and checks and 5 + level temp hp, advantage on perception and you can grant advantage on an attack in the zone as a reaction, or heal creaturs you choose in the zone level hp when you spend a spell slot on a healing spell and advantage to detect creatures in the zone

noteList.features:
Human Features:
Noble Feature:
â¢ You can secure an audience with a local noble
Paladin Features:
â¢ As an action, detect the location of any celestial, fiend or undead and any consecrated or desecrated place or object within 60 feet (1 + Cha mod per day)
â¢ Gain a reservoir of healing power (10hp), and as an action, you can heal a creature you touch by draining that power. You can also cure one poison or disease from the creature by sacrificing 5hp from the reservoir
â¢ Fighting Style - Defense: +1 to AC while wearing armor
â¢ You can sacrifice a spell slot to deal (1 + spell level)d8 radiant damage plus 1d8 extra damage vs undead/fiends, when you hit with a melee weapon attack
